channel.title: Cannot Find "Main"
channel.description:
mmk, well i just downloaded a 508 to try to get it to work etc, and i get a main class error kinda thing, idk what the hell it is tbh lol
Its basically saying "Exception in thread "Main" java.lang.unsupportedClassVerisonError: Client : unsupported major.major verstion 51.0"
Help please

item.title: Cannot Find "Main"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Major minor is thrown when you run a batch file that is using an older version of java then your compiler was compiled with. You can easily resolve this by downloading the newest java and recompiling/rerunning the run batch

Read full topic
